mChildPoleHologram.description: Used to redirect input and construct poles when needed

mConnectionComponents.description: The two connection components for this pipeline.

mUpgradedPipeline.description: If we upgrade another pipeline this is the pipeline we replace.

mDefaultPipelineSupportRecipe.description: Class of conveyor pole to place at the end.

mBendRadius.description: What radius will the bends have.

mBendRadius2D.description: What radius will the bends have in the 2D mode AKA conveyor mode. Should be in sync with conveyors.

mMinBendRadius.description: The minimum allowed bend radius before the shape get's invalid

mMaxSplineLength.description: Maximum number of meshes per pipe

mConnectionArrowComponent.description: Arrow to indicate the direction of the conveyor while placing it.

mSplineData.description: This is the data needed to create the spline component (local space).

mIsConnectionSnappedOnConstruction.description: Used in the construction message to determine if this has snapped to an existing connection or not

mMaxPlacementFloorAngle.description: The maximum allowed angle on the floor for this hologram to be placed on (in degrees).

mClearanceBox.description: Component to check build clearance to other buildings.

mSnappedBuilding.description: If we have snapped to another buildable, i.e. foundation, floor etc, this is it.

mLoopSound.description: Looping sound to play on holograms

mClearanceDetector.description: Clearance detector box. Used to detect nearby clearances an display them during the build steps

mPlacementMaterial.description: Can we construct the building, updated by SetCanConstruct from the build gun.

mValidPlacementMaterial.description: Material on hologram for valid placement.

mInvalidPlacementMaterial.description: Material on hologram for invalid placement.

mBuildClass.description: The class for the build actor this hologram wants to construct. Set on spawn.

mIsDisabled.description: If this hologram is disabled and should not be visible or constructed.

mIsChanged.description: If the hologram has changed, i.e. multi step placement or rotation.

mInitialScrollModeValue.description: The client needs to know the initial saved scroll mode value from the BuildGun.

mConstructionPosition.description: Temp memory holders for when holograms are serialized for construction messages (replication)

mConstructionRotation.description: Temp memory holders for when holograms are serialized for construction messages (replication)
